resources.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS champion ( champion_code LONG PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, champion_name VARCHAR(100), lane_strength FLOAT(5,2), team_fight FLOAT(5,2), split_push FLOAT(5,2), one_vs_one_strength FLOAT(5,2), initiating FLOAT(5,2), poking FLOAT(5,2), type INT(2), to_six_potential FLOAT(5,2), to_elv_potential FLOAT(5,2), to_sixteen_potential FLOAT(5,2) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS player ( player_code LONG PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, season_code LONG, player_name VARCHAR(50), position INT(2), physical FLOAT(5,2), team_fight FLOAT(5,2), out_smart FLOAT(5,2), lane_strength FLOAT(5,2), stability FLOAT(5,2), fame_lv INT(3) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS player_champion_played_data ( player_code LONG, champion_code LONG, win INT(3), lose INT(3), kda FLOAT(4,1) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sub_roster ( subRoster_Code PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, player_code LONG, main_order INT(2) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS team ( team_code LONG PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, user_code LONG, user_type INT(2), team_name VARCHAR(100), main_roster_code LONG, sub_roster_code LONG )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user ( user_code LONG PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, user_id VARCHAR(200), user_phone_num VARCHAR(500), user_nick_name VARCHAR(150), user_fame_lv INT(3), user_money INT(11), season_code INT(2), match_num INT(4), api_ver INT(3) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_record ( user_record_code LONG PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, user_code LONG, season_code LONG, rank VARCHAR(150), win INT(3), lose INT(3), win_diff INT(3), fame_diff INT(3), top_player_code LONG, jungle_player_code LONG, mid_player_code LONG, ad_player_code LONG, support_player_code LONG )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS champion_counter ( champion_code LONG PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, counter_champion_code LONG, lane_win_rate FLOAT(4,1) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS league_schedule ( league_schedule_code LONG PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, match_num INT(4), team_code_a LONG, team_code_b LONG, score_a INT(2), score_b INT(2), play_flag LONG )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS main_roster ( main_roster_code LONG PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, player_code LONG, main_order INT(2) )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS match_data ( match_data_code LONG PRIMARY KEY autoincrement, league_schedule_code LONG, team_code LONG, player_code LONG, champion_code LONG )
